source/maxent/line_stream_iterator.hpp

00001 // Stream iterators over text lines
00002 // Modified from istream_iterator implementation from GNU ISO C++ Library
00003 // Typical code:
00004 //    line_stream_iterator<> line(cin);
00005 //    line_stream_iterator<> lend;
00006 //    for (; line != lend; ++line) {
00007 //        cout << *line;
00008 //    }
00009

00042 #ifndef LINE_STREAM_ITERATOR_H
00043 #define LINE_STREAM_ITERATOR_H
00044 
00045 
00046 #include <string>
00047 #include <iostream>
00048 #include <iterator>
00049 
00050 using namespace std;
00051 template<typename _Tp = std::string, typename _CharT = char, 
00052     typename _Traits = char_traits<_CharT>, typename _Dist = ptrdiff_t> 
00053     class line_stream_iterator 
00054     : public iterator<input_iterator_tag, _Tp, _Dist, const _Tp*, const _Tp&>
00055 {
00056     public:
00057         typedef _CharT                         char_type;
00058         typedef _Traits                        traits_type;
00059         typedef basic_istream<_CharT, _Traits> istream_type;
00060 
00061     private:
00062         istream_type*   _M_stream;
00063         _Tp             _M_value;
00064         bool            _M_ok;
00065 
00066     public:      
00067         line_stream_iterator() : _M_stream(0), _M_ok(false) {}
00068 
00069         line_stream_iterator(istream_type& __s) : _M_stream(&__s) { _M_read(); }
00070 
00071         line_stream_iterator(const line_stream_iterator& __obj) 
00072             : _M_stream(__obj._M_stream), _M_value(__obj._M_value), 
00073         _M_ok(__obj._M_ok) 
00074         { }
00075 
00076         const _Tp& operator*() const { return _M_value; }
00077 
00078         const _Tp* operator->() const { return &(operator*()); }
00079 
00080         line_stream_iterator& operator++() 
00081             { _M_read(); return *this; }
00082 
00083         line_stream_iterator operator++(int)  
00084             {
00085                 line_stream_iterator __tmp = *this;
00086                 _M_read();
00087                 return __tmp;
00088             }
00089 
00090         bool _M_equal(const line_stream_iterator& __x) const
00091             { return (_M_ok == __x._M_ok) && (!_M_ok || _M_stream == __x._M_stream);}
00092 
00093     private:      
00094         void _M_read() 
00095             {
00096                 _M_ok = (_M_stream && *_M_stream) ? true : false;
00097                 if (_M_ok) 
00098                 {
00099                     // *_M_stream >> _M_value;
00100                     getline(*_M_stream, _M_value);
00101                     _M_ok = *_M_stream ? true : false;
00102                 }
00103             }
00104 };
00105 
00106 template<typename _Tp, typename _CharT, typename _Traits, typename _Dist>
00107 inline bool 
00108 operator==(const line_stream_iterator<_Tp, _CharT, _Traits, _Dist>& __x,
00109         const line_stream_iterator<_Tp, _CharT, _Traits, _Dist>& __y) 
00110 { return __x._M_equal(__y); }
00111 
00112 template <class _Tp, class _CharT, class _Traits, class _Dist>
00113 inline bool 
00114 operator!=(const line_stream_iterator<_Tp, _CharT, _Traits, _Dist>& __x,
00115         const line_stream_iterator<_Tp, _CharT, _Traits, _Dist>& __y) 
00116 { return !__x._M_equal(__y); }
00117 
00118 
00119 #endif
